Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small RectangularGroupoid Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small RectangularGroupoid AllSmallRectangularGroupoid is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic rectangulargroupoid models from orders 2 to 5.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of RectangularGroupoid formulas(RectangularGroupoid).
(u*v = x & w*y = x) -> u*y = x & w*v = x.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
